item.title: How do i make pk zones and safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @_M_ose ~M°ose~
item.description:
@_M_ose wrote:

In other words…

Search Public Boolean nonWild

You will see somthing like

(absX >= 2665 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || ^^From Mike

(absX >= SouthwestX && absX <= NortheastX && absY >= SouthwestX && absY <= NortheastY) ||

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make pk zones and safe zones?

item.title: How do i make pk zones and safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Find

Public Boolean Nonwild() {

Then you will see something like:

 || (absX >= 2665 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414  && absY <= 3429) ||

Now u change the first 4 digits (2665) to your left hand X co-ord, and your second 4 digits (2683) to your right hand side X co-ord, finally your third set (3414) are your bottom Y co-ord, and finally your last 4 (3429) are the top Y cord. This means the system works in a box, to create a slant in your pk area u will have to create multiple boxes of codes.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make pk zones and safe zones?
